Text.Value: Do I know you?
Simple questions, to help understand the shape of a person's heart - their desires, their fears... their failings.
Freedom, from all that pains the spirit. We show those in suffering the wonder of Lady Shar's gift.
Let me enter.
Follow me.
You think you are in a position to make demands? This is the Mother Superior's house, raised in Lady Shar's honour, for the pursuit of her greatness.
I know what this place really is... but I don't recall you. Were we acquainted?
Welcome to the House of Grief... or perhaps 'welcome' is the wrong word, Shadowheart.
Would you accuse a surgeon of robbing a tumour? I think not.
You must submit to the Mapping of the Heart. Only then can we know if you have truly earned the glory the Nightsinger has bestowed upon you.
First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart. Then we will see exactly how far you have strayed.
So the rumours are true then... the Dark Lady has blessed you. Most curious.
Show respect - you can fall much, much farther if you try the Mother Superior's patience.
So, this must be where the Unburdening occurs... exactly what is that?
Stand aside, whoever you are.
Perhaps, perhaps not - that depends on you. Lady Shar may honour you, but your memories are a privilege. Time will tell if you have earned them.
Freedom, from all that pains the spirit. But you know this already, even if you do not think you know it.
I need to enter.
Do I know you? I like to be on a first-name basis before I give someone a thrashing, ideally.
In due time. First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart - only then can we know what is to be done with you.
You haven't changed one bit, have you? I hope you remember it all, in the end. I want you to know how much of a failure you truly are.
As you wish.
Do I know you? I like to be on a first-name basis before I give someone a thrashing, ideally.
You were entrusted with a mission - at the Mother Superior's command, acting for Lady Shar herself.
I met a man who'd been robbed of his memories - your handiwork?
Do I know you?
It seems you have failed them both, and yet you come here, brazen as anything. We will soon see what is to be done with you.
It will come back to you, in due time. First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart - only then can we know what is to be done with you.
There's been some debate whether you'd even show up and face the consequences of your actions. I assumed you'd try to flee, like a craven.
This is a place of healing. Anyone who partook in our methods did so willingly, and left with a smile on their face, freed from their troubles.
Lady Shar may smile upon you, but it is the Mother Superior who holds your fate in her hands.
The Mapping of the Heart...?
Follow me. The Mapping will reveal the path to you, if you are indeed worthy.
I need to see the Mother Superior.
Welcome back - we've been awaiting you, Shadowheart.
So, this must be where the Unburdening occurs... exactly what is that?
You know me? Can't say the feeling's mutual. Maybe you're just forgettable.
But that is not why you are here. The Mother Superior awaits you, and you have much  to answer for.

Synopsis: Serves as the front desk for the House of Grief. Will reject any attempts to book an appointment unless Shadowheart is there.
